E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 7/1/1990
Subject: Status of Ray Montgomery
Dear Sir,
Ray Montgomery shouldn't play at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an AVG of .241 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 7/19/1990
Subject: Progress of Archie Corbin
Dear Sir,
Archie Corbin has an ERA of 2.57 at A Clearwater Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/21/1990
Subject: Status of Chad Curtis
Dear Sir,
Chad Curtis shouldn't play at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/21/1990
Subject: Progress of Barry Manuel
Dear Sir,
Barry Manuel has nothing more to prove at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 1.50 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/25/1990
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Wednesday, 9/24/1990
Subject: Successful Promotion Day
Hello,
That was quite a nice game, the fans loved it!
It seems that the promotion was a success, our
fan interest increased!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 10/2/1990
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Sid Fernandez
